types.name: IParameterValue
types.summary: Represents an abstraction of a parameter value.

types.name: NotificationData
types.summary: Provides data that was retrieved by a notification.

types.name: ParameterValue
types.summary: Represents the value of a parameter which consits of a single value.

types.name: ParameterValueArray
types.summary: Represents the value of a parameter which consits of a multiple values.

types.name: QueryClient
types.summary: Represents a client that can be used to access the TeamSpeak Query API on a remote server.

types.name: QueryError
types.summary: Represents a query error that comes with every API response.

types.name: QueryException
types.summary: Represents errors that occur during query execution.

types.name: QueryProtocolException
types.summary: Represents errors that occur during queries caused by protcol violations.

types.name: QueryResponseDictionary
types.summary: Represents the data of a query response.
